item.title: International Comic Arts Association
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Got an email a couple days ago that the International Comic Arts Association website is now live. I've ranted about this before, it's exactly (one of the things) that the comic industry needs. Go check them out and send them some cash or comics if you can.
